Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; exterior reserved.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1156) (phase 2)
Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 303, no. 1119, pl. 153, no. 1119)
